abstract: To stand out from countless other sellers, entrepreneurs must research each marketplace’s procedures and commissions and polish customer-service practices.
snippet: To stand out from countless other sellers, entrepreneurs must research each marketplace’s procedures and commissions and polish customer-service practices.
lead_paragraph: The online marketplaces eBay and Amazon once seemed like surefire places to make extra money or to build an online retail business. It’s not quite so simple anymore.

headline.main: How to Sell on Amazon and eBay
headline.print_headline: Small-Business Guide: How to Sell on Amazon and eBay

abstract: “There are a lot of people going down this path that are making little or no money,” said one expert.
snippet: “There are a lot of people going down this path that are making little or no money,” said one expert.
lead_paragraph: Selling on online marketplaces like Amazon and eBay is getting more complicated. As Kelly K. Spors reports today in her small-business guide:

headline.main: Can You Still Make a Living Selling on Amazon and eBay?
